website_summaries.verdict: If you spend a great deal of time talking and listening throughout the day, you'll love this headset's superb sound quality.
pros: Stands out from competitors with its crystal-clear sound quality
cons: It's not uncommon to experience an increased amount of static when moving away from the Bluetooth-enabled device

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset on dec 27th 2 months after i purchased it the speaker stopped working on the L side. I sent it in for repair, it was returned to me and worked for 2 months then I had the same problem. I sent it in again and it was repaired. 2 weeks later it came apart at the seam that connects it together. I sent it in again and they would not help me, they said it had physical damage and would not fix or replace it. I spent $96 on a head set that was broken 25% of the time and LG will not stand behind their product to replace it. VERY FRUSTRATING!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This may only last a few years
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for hands free phone calls and for about two years this worked great. But then after few years the the headset needed to be charged more often and then one of the earbuds stopped working. I continued to use it because I had paid close to $100 for the headset, but then one day it just broke in half. I was never ruff with the headset and I really expected it to hold up better then it did. So now I’m looking for a new headset, one that would last longer and not break on me.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyandBrains

customer_reviews.title: I never had a problem with the performance, I ...
customer_reviews.text: I never had a problem with the performance, I just believe that the product is poorly made. The headset is in three pieces, two side pieces and a single neck piece. After about 5 months the connection between one side and the neck piece broke. Two months later the other side broke. LG will not cover physical damage under the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: 3DVol

customer_reviews.title: Best model yet
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd LG headset and this is my favorite. They did a great job incorporating new designs the last lacked. Love the hard design WITH a soft back (of neck area). This helps keep its shape and stability in your front neck/collarbone area but comfort and flexibility on back of neck!! That’s what I had wanted between the prior all soft design and all hard design. Best of both!! Sound is great. Buttons and placement still intuitive and easy. Slimmer. And love the noise canceling sound quality Love!! I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: In spite of the lack of bass still the best I’ve heard
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The first broke on both sides where the flexible part meets the inflexible. So... I looked high and low for another pair with comparable sound. Maybe more bass if possible. Oh, and they HAD to be retractable! Love that feature. Anyway, plenty with more bass. But, the clarity of the mids and high have spoiled me. I love bass. But, now anything else sounds muddled. So, IMO this is as good as it gets for retractable earbuds. Be very careful because they are fragile. Update: in only a month. This one broke. The shinny part is my attempt at repair.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Mischke

customer_reviews.title: I'm done with LG headsets
customer_reviews.text: My 910s lasted 9 months before the right ear bud stopped working completely, which is the same reason I bought these to replace another LG headset that had an ear bud stop working. This is my third and last pair. When they are working, they're great. Battery life is long, charging time is short, and audio quality is good. But for the price, I can't justify continuing to buy LG headsets that don't survive more than 9 months to a year. I ordered a cheaper, off-brand pair that are on the way, and they have great reviews. Hoping to get a longer lifespan out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Swift

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have owned about 4 LG Headphones over the last 8+ years; I know what you are supposed to get from those products. However, there was something very wrong with this headset: It had an EXTREMELY POOR QUALITY ... Fragile materials, rough finishes, poor sound, cords difficult to pull out and almost impossible to retract. I know LG can do much better products as opposed to this one that made me felt like if I was scammed with some sort of cheap imitation ... Fortunately, Amazon wa able to take care of the refund for me, but I believe I should still express my disappointment with this particular product quality
customer_reviews.author: Marco V

customer_reviews.title: The 900 model is better then the 910
customer_reviews.text: I had the 2 prior models and loved them but microphone on the 910 doesn't work as well. I often have complains that I can't be heard on calls. As soon as I turn off the 910 and use my iPhone people say the here me much better. Also the 910 Doesn't integrate with the iPhone as well as the 900. The audio portion of videos often don't go to the headset also the audio portion of voice messages don't go to the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Electra Small

customer_reviews.title: Poor materials used, do not buy, LG WILL REFUSE to repair it while under warranty !
customer_reviews.text: The design concept is excellent however the materials used fail miserably and LG WILL NOT warantee the product, period. This is the 3rd and last time I will ever purchase this product, LG should should have either redesigned or discontinued this product. One or both of the earbuds normly go dead within the first 8 months followed by the neckband connection failure usually within the first 12 months of daily use. Attached is a photo of the failed headset with less than 10 months of daily use. Don't throw away your money of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peter .O

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these headphones. I'm reviewing it after nearly a year of using them, and they are absolutely awesome. Still hold a great charge, still retract beautifully, still so comfortable I forget I'm wearing them. Bluetooth headphones rock, because no more forgetting you have them in and standing up to have the buds violently ripped from your ear holes. LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hurst

customer_reviews.title: WORKS great till it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I love these. You can listen to a book, podcast and get your phone and they are so very convienent. The problem.... They work very well for the first 4 to 8 months and start to crap out. The right ear wire started going out at about 6 months, but all I had to do was pull it all the way out and it worked. Then after living with that for a few months it got harder and harder to turn on and off to the point now that it is just off! Not GOOD! I use it a lot, but it should work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: A solid 4 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: I picked up this pair of headphones after an uncle of mine who works at a telecom gave me a pair of LG HBS-770s. Those were OK, but I fell in love with the form factor. Always having headphones there at the ready without even really noticing them is extremely nice. When the wiring connections on that set went bad I picked this set, and I couldn't be happier. The sound quality is great, and aside from the rewinders getting slightly less powerful they've held up well.
customer_reviews.author: John Duli

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, beautiful, and discreet BUT major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this particular style of Tone Infinim's for a while now because they're so sleek. People are always asking where I bought them because they're discreet yet unique. The sound, range, and quality of the headphones are great buuut, there is one major design flaw. There is a band of silicone/soft plastic followed by the harder plastic where all of the buttons and earphones are located. The two joints are held together by soft plastic-looking screws(?), which unfortunately will cause the plastic to break from the silicone over time.
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, beautiful, discreet, BUT major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this particular style of Tone Infinim's for a while now because they're so sleek. People are always asking where I bought them because they're discreet yet unique. The sound, range, and quality of the headphones are great buuut, there is one major design flaw. There is a band of silicone/soft plastic followed by the harder plastic where all of the buttons and earphones are located. The two joints are held together by soft plastic-looking screws(?), which unfortunately will cause the plastic to break from the silicone over time.
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality. I have long hair and the solid neck piece has worked out well as far as not getting all tangled in my hair. The earbuds retract conveniently, and there are volume and other audio/call controls on the band. The rubber ear pieces that came on the headphones were roo parge for me ear and fell out incessantly. Once I switched to the smallest ear pieces that came in the box I was much happier with the fit and they no longer fell out constantly. The bluetooth range js also surprisingly strong. I can leave my phone in the house and be outside in my car with rhe doors shut and still have a decent conection.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Caggiano

customer_reviews.title: Good concept.  Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good concept. I was starting to like it. But the charge port on the headset was problematic from the start. Wouldn't charge at first. Then i figured out that I had to angle the charge cable a certain way when connecting..... i think... ? I finagled with the port a few times to try to get it to accept the cable correctly on a consistent basis. Worked a couple times but the last time i needed to do that, the port was finished. Purchased the LG BHS-910 on 3/11/18. I went to see if i could return it a week or so ago and wasn't able to. Six weeks in and I'm having to buy a new headset. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MDamian

customer_reviews.title: I bought this headphone set because it had great reviews and it says it's Bluetooth range was 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone set because it had great reviews and it says it's Bluetooth range was 30 or 33ft. The audio is great on my end, however it does pick up a lot of background noise on outgoing audio. Also much like every other headset I have owned. I can't out my phone in my pocket without the bluetooth loosing connectivity. I don't understand why it is so hard to keep connected less then 3ft away. I wouldn't buy this again, but it is an ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Venka

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality - Bad design.
customer_reviews.text: The first few months these worked great. Then, the quality started to decline rapidly. I took very good care of this headset but the entire right side lost sound, then they started having difficulty connecting to my phone, then they completely fell apart on the right side. Very disappointed considering these were a bit higher priced than other options. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Book_Lover87

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. However I received 8/22/16 and one ear bud stopped working 1/7/17. Contacted tech union and was told 90 day return/replace expired. Informed I could buy another at 10 % off from tech union... Really !!! LG has a one year warranty. It has been slightly over 4 months. I called LG directly and was informed it can be replaced free of charge. I love Amazon but I will not buy anything from tech union again. There customer service stinks ( being politically correct), they do not have the customer entrance at heart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Only ones I like but they don't work....
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these earphones, of all the earphones I have tried including Bose, and yadayada every cheapo brand. I have owned 4 of these, I love them but the D*** thing won't work for any length of time. Shame on you LG . These arrived today and the right one doesn't work. I just need ONE set to work! I am nearly totally blind and I need good earphones for books etc. darn It!
customer_reviews.author: L.W.

customer_reviews.title: but my podcasts sound great and I have not gotten any complaints about the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not an audiophile, but my podcasts sound great and I have not gotten any complaints about the call quality. I use these everyday at work for 6 to 10 hours and the battery lasts all day if I charge them at night. I was worried about the retractable cords being too small at first, but they have held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I tried out a few different brands of Bluetooth earbuds, and these are by far my favorite. Excellent sound quality (Harmon Kardon was involved), very comfortable to wear, solid battery life, and easily accessible controls. I was initially worried about the very thin cables running from the buds back to the neckband, but they've held up well in a year and a half of daily use. The fact that the earbuds retract back into the neckband is a really nice feature for storage.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: ... now and I have to say I am really pleased. I find them very easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a while now and I have to say I am really pleased. I find them very easy to use and I especially like that I can pair them with any Bluetooth device that I have without trouble. It's easy to get the muscle memory down of where the buttons are and the audio quality is clear and great. They are not too lightweight to where you'll forget they're there and end up bending over and having them fall off. At first I worried that the headphone cords would be too fragile and that I would end up ripping them out of their socket but they are really durable. I especially like the retractable feature!
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: they are pretty strong.
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to listen to my voicemails. The headphones repeat "Call ended" about 6-7 times before it plays the voicemail. And heaven forbid I should be able to rewind it a little bit. If I try and listen to it again, I have to turn the headphones off and just listen to it straight from my phone. The wires seem VERY flimsy. I was worried that I would tug too hard on them or the would break somehow, but surprisingly...they are pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a dog wearing an electronic training collar because whenever ...
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint about this device is that there is no way to edit the options on it. The only software I could find on the App Store doesn't work with this model.Wearing it, I feel like a dog wearing an electronic training collar because whenever the headset connects or disconnects from the phone (both when it's out of range and even when it's right next to the phone), it buzzes around my neck. Now I wear it but leave it off and only turn it on when I want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great until they stop working
customer_reviews.text: I've tried 2 pairs of these. They're great until they suddenly stop working. Sometimes it's the cable for the earpiece - just won't retract anymore. Sometimes bluetooth drops out completely or the buttons stop working. I assume it's poor quality control. If you're lucky and get a good pair - savor it. When they work, they were my favorite. I won't be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my second set to break in the exact same place!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME except it has a very short life span. They earbuds pull out nicely, everything about the sound is beyond exceptional, except they break where they connect and it is the second set I have had that has done the exact same thing so I am going to say its a design flaw. Very disappointing. Will not repurchase. I gave one extra star for quality of calls and quality of sound of music, but that really can't make up for a broken useless headset. :*(
customer_reviews.author: Lizanne

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I use them for work for the phone. The sound is great and the call quality is excellent. I keep going to this brand for bluetooth headphones because it vibrates when a call comes in which I need tohelp wake me up at night for a call. (i am a very sound sleeper) I love the pink color. I can't find anything but black in the stores. I do recommend this product for listening to music or phone calls
customer_reviews.author: karenL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product considering I'm prone to destroying headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product considering I'm prone to destroying headphones. Sleek design fits nicely under shirt collar, good sound quality and decent bass. Has a shorter range than other headsets but favorite set so far, right ear bud wire had a bad spot from pulling out but works now. Overall I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. LG will not replace it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. LG will not replace it, LG was the only brand name Bluetooth that I have ever bought. I will never trust their products again. While having a conversation, the person on the other end cannot hear you clearly-voice goes in and out. Poorly made-it came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Stars for SURE! Good Cellular Dog Collar.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 05.10.16. The form factor is amazing, love having endless battery power, good controls placed in logical spots and the retractable earbuds are super fly. It kinds feels like a business dog-collar when I'm wearing it, I can never escape (or miss) the calls. The bluetooth is great, much stronger than other units Ive tried, very little interference or drops. The sound is okay, other Bhang and Olfsen units sound better. The microphone is okay as well, some "distant" type voice & sounds reported by some people I speak with using this microphone.
customer_reviews.author: CaliSnowDog

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My headset has stopped working. I rarely use them. They are for work only. I have only had them for 90 days. To the trash can they go. I will not be ordering anymore electronics from this company. They are advertised as new but I’m sure they are REFURBISHED
customer_reviews.author: Loveshopping

customer_reviews.title: Tone Infinim Bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had a set of LG Tone headphones, and liked them, but NOT the dangling wires and the magnets that didn't always hold the earpieces up. These solve that problem. I got these because I was having background noise problems when on calls. This set seems to have corrected that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Allen

customer_reviews.title: Inferior individual device.
customer_reviews.text: 3rd one. First two lasted a year before something broke or failed. Used every day. This one lasted 5 months. Wife dropped on the floor can the connection between sikcone neck band and plastic broke. Other side broke 2 weeks later. Speakers still work fine but looks cheesy with electrical tape holding it together. Might just be an indiviual model or small batch that is inferior. Loved the other two.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Folsom

customer_reviews.title: No One will honor the warranty
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about the headset, this was my second pair of LG bluetooth headset. My left earbud stopped working about a week before the warranty ended. Amazon said contact the manufacture, the manufacture kept saying the warranty was up, then I got the Better Business Bureau involved now the LG is saying that the right side is cracked nulling the warranty. The switched the product, mine were not cracked and it was the left side not working.
customer_reviews.author: Braunwynn Franklin

customer_reviews.title: I hope just got a bad apple really I like the first set I will ...
customer_reviews.text: After a year, my headphones broke into 2 parts that I had purchased in person at ATT. I decided to order others of the same model here on Amazon but the quality is not the same: the battery never fully charged never says "high battery", says medium and does not give much time when it says low battery and dies immediately.other thing the range It is very low practically you almost needs to have your cell at 10 steps away. I hope just got a bad apple really I like the first set I will look over to buy it again and get better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Adela Tovalin

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until they broke
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great until the area where the back (neck) piece connects to the arm disconnected. It still functions but feels uncomfortable on my neck as it is not even. It may seem like a minor nuisance but my last pair of an older model lasted much longer than 9 months without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Headset Discon
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I needed a new headset for work and purchased this one. Within 2 months of using it I started having issues with connectivity and my headset would disconnect. I thought it may be related to the area I was in. Now it has been 8 months and every time I use this headset it disconnects. It says "Out of Range Trying to Connect". So frustrated. Just received it back from LG and they are not owning the problem. Spoke with supervisor Jake employee #410195 who didn't care to help me. I'm calling headquarters. Don't buy this product. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the convenience of having a retractable headset around my ...
customer_reviews.text: been wearing the LG Tone headsets for years. This is my third pair and they usually last 1 to 2 years until I wear them out. I like the convenience of having a retractable headset around my neck. They can be sort of glitchy at times and the Bluetooth range is somewhat weak. The problem is, LG has the best design and i'm sure their patents prevent anyone else from making an equivalent-but-better product. So I'm stuck with these until I can find a headset that will beam the sound directly into my brain.
customer_reviews.author: holaymolay

customer_reviews.title: I use them WAYYY too much and probably in completely unfair ways and they do great for me each set
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair of these for years. I use them WAYYY too much and probably in completely unfair ways and they do great for me each set. They can be difficult to clean without pulling off a small piece though so be very careful, it’s like a screen or something and if it comes off you’ll have issues. Over time I tend to lose one side and so I replace them, but I really do kind of abuse mine.
customer_reviews.author: Always looking to mimic life more closely

customer_reviews.title: I bought this item because I loved the previous version
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I loved the previous version. However this item is not the same. I bought it for meetings in particular and in every meeting people were having issues hearing me. I adjusted settings on my phone as well as on the headset and still I was in a tunnel or an in and out effect. The headphones are great for listening to music and I never had issues with me hearing others. They just could not hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff York

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality Overall - Drops Calls
customer_reviews.text: This is my second LG neckband. The first was the 900 series and was the best bluetooth I've ever had. When it finally wore out and bough this model thinking I would be just as happy... but NO. After about 2 minutes into every call it will drop connection. Sometimes it hangs up in the process, other times it just stops working and the call switches to normal phone mode. I've never had an issue with my bluetooth connection so I doubt it's my phone (iPhone 8) In additional to the dropped call, the earbuds don't retract all the way, which is more annoying that anything. Overall I'm extremely disappointed in LG now.
customer_reviews.author: Cav17

customer_reviews.title: Such a good investment good quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones so much. So glad I finally took the plunge and bought them. They've held up amazing. I always buy lg phones so even with my upgraded phone when my old one stopped working these where amazing. The sound quality actually got even better with my newer phone which I was super excited about. I have used these alot the battery life works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Completely NOT Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product since April. The left side volume just quit working. I followed the BS warranty instructions, sent a copy of my invoice, my headset to LG for repair. Today I got it back only to find that they will not honor the warranty because my invoice from Accessory Net and my headphones do not reflect the same model number!?!?!? I've searched and searched for a way to contact the seller directly but keep ending up on Amazons sight which then directs me to LG since I am past the 30 day return time-frame. To say I an extremely angry at this point is an understatement!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, performance and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great! I have been using this 910 for nearly six months. I had a concern that the retractable ear buds mechanism would begin to fail. So far, the mechanism has performed flawlessly day-after-day. A great feature is, automatic reading of incoming text messages and notifications. The only feature lacking is one I have with my Plantronics Voyager Legend, which announces a caller's name. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: TFB

customer_reviews.title: Love LG headsets
customer_reviews.text: I had the LG 900 headset and loved it. So far so good with these 910’s as well. I have had to get used to the answer button on the side and not the top. The Bluetooth range doesn’t seem as long but I only notice it when I leave my phone on my desk and go to get something away from my desk. Very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Call

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, wasn't sure I wanted to spend the money, but I'm glad I did. They are comfortable and I sometimes forget I have them on. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it can be hard to hear when in a busy area. I don't know if they are supposed to be noise cancelling, but I will look for it in the future. Love the comfort of the ear buds and the clarity of the connection.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works great :-)
customer_reviews.text: I love it, no complaints here. They do everything advertised and I have had no issues. I got these to replace my old LG Bluetooth head phones that had broken after 4 years of heavy use. I like that I have far more listening time and a greater range than my last one.
customer_reviews.author: Amar Rhom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for everything i.e. work home and gym. after about a year the left side ear bud went out and it is something that I probably have done to cause that. But that is why I gave a five because when it worked it was a great product and shipped with care. Received item in a timely manner and would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Good blue-tooth head set
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is above average good. Also, I am able to listen to it while driving with the car windows wind down. Unlike previous model of the LG HBS which I owned, this blue-tooth will turn off by itself after period of no usage. It thus, help to maintain the battery life of the LG HBS. Overall, I would recommend it. The only minor issue I find is the retractable ear bug cords can be little bit flimsy. I would recommend this product for light to normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Jtel87

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!!! I use it everyday now! Great for working folks who are constantly on the move all day. Take care of your clients, catch up on meetings and keep up with the family all on the go. Particularly, the noise cancellation feature helps. Callers can't her the background noise while I'm chatting with them. Even works in the shop, with grinders, blowers and other machinery running. Additionally, I've struggled to find a headphone that works while I'm out on the motorcycle. I had pretty much given up. These things allow me to clearly hear the music, loudly, at 65 MPH while the wind is whipping around me. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not for talking on mobile phone
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased many LG headsets to use to talk on our mobile phone while driving or working. This model has the worst voice quality for the person you are speaking to unless the person wearing the headset hold their head straight up and doesn't move around. The poor voice quality must be due to speaker placement. All I know is that we are now ordering a different headset as no one can understand a word my husband is saying. He says that the sound-quaility listening is OK. But we need a headset that delivers reliable communication -- outbound sound and inbound sound.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice hands free headset
customer_reviews.text: When we signed up with our new cell phone carrier, we purchased this headset though them and my husband loves it. He has a very active job and the hands free headset works out beautifully for him. He's had the original one we bought over 2 years, but recently one of the ear buds stopped working so I went looking to purchase him another one and found it though Amazon. I bought 2 so that I could have one also for when I'm busy but still need to use the phone, ect. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MyBell

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for two weeks!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a couple of weeks. The power switch doesn’t turn it off, call button randomly triggers redial, and play button works sometimes. So disappointed, I bought the same brand and model as my last pair. The last pair lasted for 2+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S Shotwell

customer_reviews.title: Bad design with cheap plastic!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. The battery life is amazing. The bluetooth works great. It reaches pretty far and I never loose a call. The problem with this type of LG headset is the crappy design and cheap plastic housing. This is the 3rd set I have broken. I am a very light user and not hard on these. They all break in the same place and LG will not stand behind repairing this even if it happens within a few months. I hate it but I am going back to using earbuds. At least I won't be out $80 every 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Andi P

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've had by far. (Heavy use)
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through so many sets of bluetooth headphones. These by far are the best ones. I have a rough job and they do the trick. Excellent music quallity, great distance. I walk around my house with them (3000 square feet. 1 story) with almost no chop. Wish the battery lasted as long as my 12 hour shifts.. lasts me about 10 hours on till battery but fully charges ridiculously fast. Retractable cables still work like new. Even after 100 plus drops and getting them caught on things.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Ewert

customer_reviews.title: They sound great and I used these headphones for about 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: They sound great and I used these headphones for about 2 weeks. The concept is good but they did not work for me. For the life of me I could not get the earbuds to stay in my ear. I tired all three sizes and they would always pop out after a few minutes. I have never had this problem before. Now I am stuck with a over priced paper weight. I am sure they will work for most people as there must be something wrong with my ears (I guess). I would give these 4 or 5 stars if I could have kept them in my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my wife, 3 months of use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife, 3 months of use and all of a sudden the ear buds produce little to no sound. I have purchased 3 LG headsets in the last year and all have similar problems after very little use. If it was one being defective not a problem... but 3 LG headsets... with the same problem. no thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Sartena

customer_reviews.title: Great durability and functionality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these headphones I have purchased. I had the first pair for a couple of years before I felt like they may be getting near the end of their life span. I bought this pair in preparation for that day and my other pair quit a week later. I was originally skeptical about the durability because of the thin speaker wire that is used to retract the earbuds, but they honestly surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: there's a good chance the plastic which holds all the switches and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'v ehad the older model with a more solid frame and I've had these which are more flexible and flimsy. there's a good chance the plastic which holds all the switches and electronics will snap and break at the part where it meets the rubber part that goes around the backside of your neck. I am figuring super glue will solve the issue.. But no that sturdy. Headset was hardly used
customer_reviews.author: Jaye C.

customer_reviews.title: 3Xs
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my daughter and she loved it. Ordered one unexpected and I used it all the time. My husband of 43 years snores and I use them to drown out the noise. Perfect !!! Bought a second one to keep in my gym bag. Never need to do without!
customer_reviews.author: D. E. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as previous models
customer_reviews.text: Issues with rewind within weeks of purchase on one side. Never quite pulls in all the way anymore. It is lighter and more flexible than previous models, but for the first time I get complaints about being too quiet and extra noise being picked up. LG seems to have sacrificed quality in several areas with this line as prices fell. Unlikely to try LG again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lintz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Product i recieved was defective and the sound keeps going in and out.. im more then upset with the product i bought from this seller. Then on top of that the seller has no contact information making it difficult for me to even get in touch with them. Havnt been able to use it at all since ive noticed the problem, so its been collecting dust on a shelf because there's no information accessible for the buyer to contact the seller. Plus i bought a 3 year protection plan for the headphones yet im having this issue.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fayah Gbollie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome while they work! But don't expect that to last for long. I have had over five pairs of them and the Bluetooth will stop working or one of the earpieces will stop working. And that will happen within the first year. Or the microphone will stop working!
customer_reviews.author: scoby151

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Product / Terrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I had this headset for about 2 months before the first earbud went out on me. I dealt with it, I only really needed one anyway. 4 months later, both earbuds have shorted out, and the product is unusable. The icing on the cake is when I sent this product in to LG for a repair, and they just sent it back to me saying it was out of warranty. I actually would of paid to have it fixed out of warranty. But nope, they just returned my completely unusable headset back to me. Thanks LG.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I love them. The sound quality wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wear them everyday! I love them. The sound quality wasn't what I expected, but it is good enough for what I use it for. Sometimes people can't hear me, and I can't tell if it's them, me, or the bluetooth connection. Works very well, but I wouldn't expect super stereo sound. They are light and I don't realize they are on most of the time. I love that they retract and the cord is inside the 'case'. I don't use them constantly, so my battery lasts about 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn D. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The Wraparound Breaks. On every one. And I've owned 5.
customer_reviews.text: At this point, I am hesitant to purchase these headphones again. I have had 3 sets in rose, and four in the black. Every single one of them has broken where the matte plastic joins to the shiny plastic on the wraparound. Some sooner than later, but they break every single time and there is no warranty replacement and no offer of help from LG. It's definitely a design flaw. Other than that, they are my go-to headset. But that will be changing as of the last set.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: The design looks good and headset looks durable
customer_reviews.text: The design looks good and headset looks durable. except for the retractable wires. the wires look too weak. I use the retractable button even to pull the wire out but it seems that this is not gonna last long. thank god, I purchased protection plan in advance. The biggest weak point is the sound. I had various tone pro models before I bought this one. This one i bought thinking about great sound quality as the name harman kardon is famous for it. but its disappointing the sound is not even closer to lg760 my last hedset
customer_reviews.author: Tejinder Aujla

customer_reviews.title: Broke two in just over a year
customer_reviews.text: I used this headset basically daily for multiple hours a day. 7 months after purchase one of the earbuds stopped working. Sent it into LG for warranty and they fixed it (not sure if mine was repaired and sent back or if it was just a new unit). 7 months after that, it has broke again. This time both headphones work, i can hear its "power up" process out of both of them, but once it connects to my cellphone (and my wifes) there is no audio. Aside from a 7 month lifespan, i liked everything about this headset.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is rather good. In call volume is easy to hear other ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is rather good. In call volume is easy to hear other person. I'm not a fan of the full circle shape. the stiffness of the band doesn't allow for a natural sit around a shirt if your wearing a collar. very annoying that it won't lay flat to conceal if not making a call. Other thing is don't like the answer button and que button on the side instead of the face like older models.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: Although the Sound is great it doesn't last long. Six months after use, no sound came out of right earbud. Then, four months later the left earbud stopped working. I am very disappointed since it was very expensive and should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two months.. disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine for two months, now it won't turn on. It shows that it took a charge and nothing happens when switching it to on. It might be due to sweat, which it's supposed to resist. I had a previous pair of LG headphones that lasted 4 years.. what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Product breaks too much
customer_reviews.text: The range on this bluetooth is short, it disconnects from phone at a short distance like 10 to 15 feet away from your phone, and the earbuds always short out, and the neck part is always breaking. Mine broke just putting it around my neck. LG your product is really starting to suck. Figure out a better plan. I'll never purchase any more of this type of bluetooth from LG ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Nickey

customer_reviews.title: Never buying LG brands again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June. I have a work and a personal phone. Both are iPhones and it does not pair well. It cuts in and out of both are connected. The restriction on the pulls of the ear buds are crazy. If you pull one side just know that it’s going to slide right off your neck. It is a lot more restricted than my previous set. It’s only been 2 months and the shielding on the ear bud wires are already stripping off! Very disappointing! This is my second pair of LG’s Bluetooth. Never buying from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these headphones since the day I received them. Ease of use, lightweight and excellent sound quality. Also, Great for listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Lg bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This is at least my 6th pair of bluetooth headsets and 3rd pair of LG. By far my favorite. It has great sound, easy connects and good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones ever! battery lasts for days. A full day with music and phone call constantly. Could be a little better quality with a thicker cord and my last pair the 900s had a quicker line retraction system. These i have to almost feed the cord into
customer_reviews.author: Taylor J Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment for LG product
customer_reviews.text: I had the silver version before this one and liked it much better. This one people have a hard time hearing me. Can't have the phone in my back pocket while using this without interference. Ear buds don't retract like previous version, seems cheaply made - a shame it wasn't cheap. I really wish I hadn't lost me previous model.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: LG HBS-910 Tone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product so far. I love the look the design and the way it fits around my neck. It's so weightless most times I forget I have it on! Sound isn't all that loud. However it could be because of the brand of phone I have. It stays charged for days at a time but I do turn it off at night. Works great! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Angela Brown

customer_reviews.title: it works great. However
customer_reviews.text: My phone is an iPhone 6S. If I am listening to music, or audio books, it works great. However, when I use it on phone conversations, no one can hear me. The mic doesn't work very well. I have used this on a Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge, and the mic works great. Overall, I love the design. It is lightweight, and half the time I forget I am wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Moon

customer_reviews.title: Another great LG product
customer_reviews.text: This makes the 4th LG Tone product I have used. I work in computer rooms with a lot of fa/ background noise. I am able to hear the person clearly. As long as I am not right next to the equipment they can hear me without to much difficulty
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love my LG Headset
customer_reviews.text: Love my LG Headset! Has more features than I realized. I take my headset everywhere with me. I work out with my LG. It puts out great clarity of music! Talking with others is seamless and they can hear me clearly and I can hear them.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones. The cords pull back so they aren't getting caught and pulled on. The speakers are out of this world! The ear piece/ speakers block all noise even before I turn on my music. And they work good for phone calls too. I like that I can listen to music and not miss a call.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a bit dissatisfied with the LG HBS-910 Tone Infinim ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit dissatisfied with the LG HBS-910 Tone Infinim Bluetooth Stereo. The reason why is because the headset doesn't recognize my voice command when trying to make a call. It does everything else well. I can check my battery life, set it to vibrate, answer an incoming call, play music etc. I just can not use it to make a call. The automated voice just keeps saying, "Say a command" and when I ask it to call one of my contacts, it doesn't. That's the only problem with the headset bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: The best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. Love this because I can listen to music, hear TV at the gym and talk. its comfortable n my ears. I still can hear someone talking to me. Also it's all contained in the headset.Since it's around my neck, I won't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LG HBS-910 Update
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband to use with his IPhone 6. Works great. Clear sound. After a little more then 3 months, the left earbud will not retract so I'm reducing the rating to a 1 star. The magnetic design for the earbuds on previous models were better.
customer_reviews.author: sobo13

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones in Black and I received Sliver ones. I also have prime and was supposed to get them in 2 days after ordering it and it didn't show up for 2 weeks almost 3 weeks. Besides all that, They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Houthoofd

customer_reviews.title: LG's Company Policy is Trash
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 4 months, right speaker quit. Because there was minor cosmetic damage, LG refused to fix my headphones. I also had insurance through Squaretrade, they too mirror anything LG says so insurance is a waste on these as well. You will not be covered unless you keep these headphones in a box, away from average use.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great, nice bluetooth set!
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described and pictured, it arrived in retail packaging, and I'm very happy with it! I previously ordered a different bluetooth and immediately returned it because it was garbage. I then bought this one and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SpecialK

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, seems a little over priced though ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, seems a little over priced though... Never been a fan of earbuds but that's on me, I couldn't find something similar with an over the ear version of this that would travel well.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Prior model is better
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model, and thought this would be an upgrade. ..sound quality is horrible. No one can hear me unless I hold the mouthpiece up to my face. The range is equally terrible. Craftsmanship is better than the old; but for its intended purpose, these are awful.
customer_reviews.author: DW978

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again in a heart beat
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones by far. I use them all day at work making phone calls. Love the retractable feature even though it doesn't work flawlessly meaning they won't go.all the way in and you have to pull the cord back out and hit the button again, but no big deal... Great sound quality
customer_reviews.author: cgm147

customer_reviews.title: There are two things that I think need improving. ...
customer_reviews.text: There are two things that I think need improving. The push button retractable ear buds are extremely slow when retracting and at times they never retract completely. Also the power switch is located on the inside of the LG 910 making it open to moisture if sweating. Locating the power switch on the opposite side would help to resolve moisture exposure
customer_reviews.author: Coy

customer_reviews.title: They're ok.
customer_reviews.text: No bass at all. There's 3 different setting for bass, and when switched between the three, I cant tell a difference. It's all treble. If you like bass in your music, these aren't for you. The people I talk to say I sound a little bit distant, but they can still hear me good. I can hear people I'm talking to just fine, but it could be a little bit louder. They'll work fine for now, but when they finally quit on me, I wont buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: I had the 1st generation of this LG Bluetooth headphone. It worked wonderfully for over a year. I thought I was upgrading to a better Bluetooth headphone. However, approximately 3 months later I am ready to replace this headphone. No one should have to repeat almost every word. i am very disappointed. I noticed early on that the quality was not as good but did not try to return the headphones. I wish I had. Now, I am in the market for something that will work properly, I like talking hands free on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: courageous

customer_reviews.title: Quality sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome device but doesn't last . . . looking to replace my third pair since August of 2016. For the price and the reputation of the brand, these things should last longer. Especially when I take great care of my stuff . . .
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dion-Jones

customer_reviews.title: No surprises
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the part missing on one of the ear buds, Had a hard time finding the right size for it I do not recommend buying reburished items from this vender. Otherwise the sound and quality of this item is good. I will purchase new next time.
customer_reviews.author: J Saldana

customer_reviews.title: LG are A Good Brand
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. it's exactly the way it looks on when I order it . It goes excellent with my rose gold iPhone 7+plus . I have a lot of and love LG products anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MONIQUE TM.

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one - Durability Issues
customer_reviews.text: I am a daily user. Was so excited to get these and try them. Sound is great! Love how it works with my phone! Only problem is 6 months in, the right hand stem has started to detach from the flexible neckband. I notice the next generation has shortened the neckband flexible portion which will address this but I paid $100 for a headset that looks stupid because I had to superglue it back together. Skip this version if you are a super user.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected..and plenty of bass! Love, love, love, and would buy again. This is my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A Gonzalez

product_meta.title: LG HBS-910.ACUSSVI Tone Infinim Bluetooth Stereo Headset - Retail Packaging - Silver
feature_bullets: Retractable Earbuds - An intuitive wire management solution with a comfortable, customizable fit.
leek and Lightweight Design - Lightweight, comfortable contour with smooth, seamless style.
Harman Kardon Signature Sound - Refined, full-bodied sound with rich bass.
Advanced Quad-Layer Speaker Technology & Dual MEMS Microphones - Enjoy robust bass, crisp treble, less distortion on high frequencies, and exceptional voice clarity.
Charging time is less than 2 hours. Operating Range 33 feet
